instruction: Write an anecdote about the power of optimism.
output:
A young man was walking home from work one day when he stumbled upon a rock in his path. He quickly became frustrated, believing that it was an obstacle preventing him from making it home before nightfall. 

But then he saw the rock differently – as an opportunity to practice his strength and prove that anything is possible if one sets their mind to it. He picked up the rock, held it above his head and continued on his way with a newfound sense of optimism.
